title: London museum may return Ethiopian loot - on loan
text:
London museum may return Ethiopian loot - on loan 1:17am EDT - 01:56 
London's V&A Museum has put Ethiopian treasures plundered by British forces on display, and it's in talks with the African country to give them back. But a loan is the most likely option, and that's unlikely to be enough for campaigners. Reuters Lucy Fielder reports.
